definition: Guardian Council, body of 12 appointed clerics which governs Iran
pinyin: Xian4 fa3 Jian1 hu4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: The new law also still gives rights of guardianship entirely to fathers and grandfathers.
sentences.chinese: 在新法規中父親和爺爺依然保持着監護權。

sentences.english: You know that angel in the gate custody fight is the most outrageous of?
sentences.chinese: 你們可知道，監護天使在城門口打架是最不像話的？

sentences.english: If so, custody of the child would be turned over to the state Department of Social Services.
sentences.chinese: 如果判定成立，孩子的監護權將交給州社會服務處。

sentences.english: The health surveillance work of occupation is a important content of occupational health work.
sentences.chinese: 職業性健康監護工作是勞動衛生工作的一項重要內容。

sentences.english: A large, central monitor is part of the standard equipment as well.
sentences.chinese: 阿大，中央監護是標準裝備的一部分。

sentences.english: In fact, the systems of parent's right and guardianship are different.
sentences.chinese: 而實際上監護制度和親權制度是兩種不同的制度。

sentences.english: Objective To study the role of the overall deli very monitoring in decreasing the case mortality rate of perinatal children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討分娩全程監護在降低圍生兒病死率中的作用。

sentences.english: Also to investigate the relationship between Abnormal FHR with neonatal prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 還分析監護異常圖形和阿氏評分的關係。

sentences.english: To summarize the guardianship of mechanical ventilation to treat respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 總結機械通氣治療呼吸衰竭的監護經驗。

sentences.english: They do not have the right to exploit a parent's right of guardianship over children.
sentences.chinese: 但他們沒有權利剝奪父母對孩子的監護權。

sentences.english: Conclusion The monitor meets the design requirements and has a good future for application.
sentences.chinese: 結論該監護儀達到設計要求，實用性好。

sentences.english: Is the type of custody important when it comes to the psychological well-being of the child?
sentences.chinese: 選擇什麼形式的監護權對孩子的心理成長重要嗎？

sentences.english: I don't think we need a chaperon.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們不需要監護人。

sentences.english: In Scotts law pupil children have tutors.
sentences.chinese: 在蘇格蘭法律中，學令兒童有監護人。

sentences.english: The design has been applied in the project-ECG Tele-monitoring Network System.
sentences.chinese: 方案已成功應用於遠程心電監護網絡系統。

sentences.english: Note: Parent or guardian may sign on behalf of a minor aged less than 18 years.
sentences.chinese: 週歲的未成年人可由父母或監護人代簽。

definition: to examine a wound or injury (typically for forensic purposes)
to support/to provide support for/to maintain
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
